02114 altsyncram micro_rom_inst(
02115     .clock0     (clock),
02116 
02117     .address_a  (micro_pc),
02118     .q_a        (micro_data)
02119 );
02120 defparam
02121     micro_rom_inst.operation_mode   = "ROM",
02122     micro_rom_inst.width_a          = 88,
02123     micro_rom_inst.widthad_a        = 9,
02124     micro_rom_inst.init_file        = "ao68000_microcode.mif";
02125 
02126 endmodule
02127 
02128 /***********************************************************************************************************************
02129   Instruction decoder
02130  ***********************************************************************************************************************/
02131 
02132 /*! \brief Decode instruction and addressing mode.
02133  
02134   The decoder is an instruction and addressing mode decoder. For instructions it takes as input the ir register
02135   from the registers module. The output of the decoder, in this case, is a microcode address of the first microcode
02136   word that performs the instruction.
02137  
02138   In case of addressing mode decoding, the output is the address of the first microcode word that performs the operand
02139   loading or saving. This address is obtained from the currently selected addressing mode saved in the ea_mod
02140   and ea_type registers in the registers module.
02141  */
02142 module decoder(
02143     input clock,
02144     input reset_n,
02145 
02146     input supervisor,
02147     input [15:0] ir,
02148 
02149     // zero: no trap
02150     output [7:0] decoder_trap,
02151     output [8:0] decoder_micropc,
02152     
02153     output [8:0] save_ea,
02154     output [8:0] perform_ea_write,
02155     output [8:0] perform_ea_read,
02156     output [8:0] load_ea,
02157     
02158     input [3:0] ea_type,
02159     input [2:0] ea_mod,
02160     input [2:0] ea_reg
02161 );
02162 
02163 parameter [7:0]
02164     NO_TRAP                             = 8'd0,
02165     ILLEGAL_INSTRUCTION_TRAP            = 8'd4,
02166     PRIVILEGE_VIOLATION_TRAP            = 8'd8,
02167     ILLEGAL_1010_INSTRUCTION_TRAP       = 8'd10,
02168     ILLEGAL_1111_INSTRUCTION_TRAP       = 8'd11;
02169 
02170 parameter [8:0]
02171     UNUSED_MICROPC                      = 9'd0;
02172 
02173 assign { decoder_trap, decoder_micropc } =
02174     (reset_n == 1'b0) ? { NO_TRAP, UNUSED_MICROPC } :
02175 
02176     // Privilege violation and illegal instruction
02177 
02178     // ANDI to SR,EORI to SR,ORI to SR,RESET,STOP,RTE,MOVE TO SR,MOVE USP TO USP,MOVE USP TO An privileged instructions
02179     ( ( ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_0010_01_111_100 ||
02180           ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_1010_01_111_100 ||
02181           ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_0000_01_111_100 ||
02182           ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0000 ||
02183           ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0010 ||
02184           ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0011 ||
02185          (ir[15:6] == 10'b0100_0110_11 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 && ir[5:0] != 6'b111_101 && ir[5:0] != 6'b111_110 && ir[5:0] != 6'b111_111) ||
02186           ir[15:3] == 13'b0100_1110_0110_0 ||
02187           ir[15:3] == 13'b0100_1110_0110_1 ) && supervisor == 1'b0 ) ? { PRIVILEGE_VIOLATION_TRAP, UNUSED_MICROPC } :
02188     // ILLEGAL, illegal instruction
02189     ( ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1010_11_111100 ) ? { ILLEGAL_INSTRUCTION_TRAP, UNUSED_MICROPC } :
02190     // 1010 illegal instruction
02191     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b1010 ) ? { ILLEGAL_1010_INSTRUCTION_TRAP, UNUSED_MICROPC } :
02192     // 1111 illegal instruction
02193     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b1111 ) ? { ILLEGAL_1111_INSTRUCTION_TRAP, UNUSED_MICROPC } :
02194 
02195     // instruction decoding
02196 
02197     // ANDI,EORI,ORI,ADDI,SUBI
02198     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] != 3'b100 && ir[11:9] != 3'b110 && ir[11:9] != 3'b111 && ir[8] == 1'b0 &&
02199         (ir[7:6] == 2'b00 || ir[7:6] == 2'b01 || ir[7:6] == 2'b10) && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02200         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001)) &&
02201         ir[15:0] != 16'b0000_000_0_00_111100 && ir[15:0] != 16'b0000_000_0_01_111100 &&
02202         ir[15:0] != 16'b0000_001_0_00_111100 && ir[15:0] != 16'b0000_001_0_01_111100 &&
02203         ir[15:0] != 16'b0000_101_0_00_111100 && ir[15:0] != 16'b0000_101_0_01_111100 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_ANDI_EORI_ORI_ADDI_SUBI } :
02204     // ORI to CCR,ORI to SR,ANDI to CCR,ANDI to SR,EORI to CCR,EORI to SR
02205     ( ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_000_0_00_111100 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_000_0_01_111100 ||
02206         ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_001_0_00_111100 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_001_0_01_111100 ||
02207         ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_101_0_00_111100 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_101_0_01_111100 ) ?
02208         { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_ORI_to_CCR_ORI_to_SR_ANDI_to_CCR_ANDI_to_SR_EORI_to_CCR_EORI_to_SR } :
02209     // BTST register
02210     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[8:6] == 3'b100 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02211         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02212             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_100))
02213     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_BTST_register } :
02214     // MOVEP memory to register
02215     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[8] == 1'b1 && ir[5:3] == 3'b001 && ( ir[7:6] == 2'b00 || ir[7:6] == 2'b01 ) ) ?
02216         { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_MOVEP_memory_to_register } :
02217     // MOVEP register to memory
02218     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[8] == 1'b1 && ir[5:3] == 3'b001 && ( ir[7:6] == 2'b10 || ir[7:6] == 2'b11 ) ) ?
02219         { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_MOVEP_register_to_memory } :
02220     // BCHG,BCLR,BSET register
02221     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[8] == 1'b1 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 && ir[8:6] != 3'b100 &&
02222         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001))
02223     ) ?  { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_BCHG_BCLR_BSET_register } :
02224     // BTST immediate
02225     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:8] == 4'b1000 && ir[7:6] == 2'b00 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02226         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02227             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011))
02228     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_BTST_immediate } :
02229     // BCHG,BCLR,BSET immediate
02230     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:8] == 4'b1000 && ir[7:6] != 2'b00 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02231         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001))
02232     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_BCHG_BCLR_BSET_immediate } :
02233     // CMPI
02234     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[8] == 1'b0 && ir[11:9] == 3'b110 && ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02235         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001))
02236     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_CMPI } :
02237     // MOVE
02238     ( ir[15:14] == 2'b00 && ir[13:12] != 2'b00 && ir[8:6] != 3'b001 &&
02239         (ir[8:6] != 3'b111 || (ir[11:6] == 6'b000_111 || ir[11:6] == 6'b001_111)) &&
02240         (ir[13:12] != 2'b01 || ir[5:3] != 3'b001) &&
02241         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02242             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_100))
02243     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_MOVE } :
02244     // MOVEA
02245     ( ir[15:14] == 2'b00 && (ir[13:12] == 2'b11 || ir[13:12] == 2'b10) && ir[8:6] == 3'b001 &&
02246         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02247             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_100))
02248     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_MOVEA } :
02249     // NEGX,CLR,NEG,NOT,NBCD
02250     (    ir[15:12] == 4'b0100 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 && (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001) &&
02251             (    (ir[11:8] == 4'b0000 && ir[7:6] != 2'b11) || (ir[11:8] == 4'b0010 && ir[7:6] != 2'b11) || 
02252                 (ir[11:8] == 4'b0100 && ir[7:6] != 2'b11) || (ir[11:8] == 4'b0110 && ir[7:6] != 2'b11) ||
02253                 (ir[11:6] == 6'b1000_00)
02254             )
02255     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_NEGX_CLR_NEG_NOT_NBCD } :
02256     // MOVE FROM SR
02257     ( ir[15:6] == 10'b0100_0000_11 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 && (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001)
02258     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_MOVE_FROM_SR } :
02259     // CHK
02260     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0100 && ir[8:6] == 3'b110 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02261         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02262             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_100))
02263     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_CHK } :
02264     // LEA
02265     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0100 && ir[8:6] == 3'b111  && (ir[5:3] == 3'b010 || ir[5:3] == 3'b101 || ir[5:3] == 3'b110 || ir[5:3] == 3'b111) &&
02266         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02267             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011))
02268     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_LEA } :
02269     // MOVE TO CCR, MOVE TO SR
02270     ( (ir[15:6] == 10'b0100_0100_11 || ir[15:6] == 10'b0100_0110_11) && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02271         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02272             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_100))
02273     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_MOVE_TO_CCR_MOVE_TO_SR } :
02274     // SWAP,EXT
02275     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0100 && (ir[11:3] == 9'b1000_01_000 || (ir[11:7] == 5'b1000_1 && ir[5:3] == 3'b000) ) ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_SWAP_EXT } :
02276     // PEA
02277     ( ir[15:6] == 10'b0100_1000_01 && ir[5:3] != 3'b000 && (ir[5:3] == 3'b010 || ir[5:3] == 3'b101 || ir[5:3] == 3'b110 || ir[5:3] == 3'b111) &&
02278         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02279             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011))
02280     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_PEA } :
02281     // MOVEM register to memory, predecrement
02282     ( ir[15:7] == 9'b0100_1000_1 && ir[5:3] == 3'b100 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_MOVEM_register_to_memory_predecrement } :
02283     // MOVEM register to memory, control
02284     ( ir[15:7] == 9'b0100_1000_1 && (ir[5:3] == 3'b010 || ir[5:3] == 3'b101 || ir[5:3] == 3'b110 || ir[5:3] == 3'b111) &&
02285         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001)
02286     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_MOVEM_register_to_memory_control } :
02287     // TST
02288     ( ir[15:8] == 8'b0100_1010 && ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02289         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001))
02290     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_TST } :
02291     // TAS
02292     ( ir[15:6] == 10'b0100_1010_11 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02293         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001))
02294     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_TAS } :
02295     // MOVEM memory to register
02296     ( ir[15:7] == 9'b0100_1100_1 && (ir[5:3] == 3'b010 || ir[5:3] == 3'b011 || ir[5:3] == 3'b101 || ir[5:3] == 3'b110 || ir[5:3] == 3'b111) &&
02297         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02298             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011))
02299     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_MOVEM_memory_to_register } :
02300     // TRAP
02301     ( ir[15:4] == 12'b0100_1110_0100 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_TRAP } :
02302     // LINK
02303     ( ir[15:3] == 13'b0100_1110_0101_0 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_LINK } :
02304     // UNLK
02305     ( ir[15:3] == 13'b0100_1110_0101_1 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_ULNK } :
02306     // MOVE USP to USP
02307     ( ir[15:3] == 13'b0100_1110_0110_0 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_MOVE_USP_to_USP } :
02308     // MOVE USP to An
02309     ( ir[15:3] == 13'b0100_1110_0110_1 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_MOVE_USP_to_An } :
02310     // RESET
02311     ( ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0000 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_RESET } :
02312     // NOP
02313     ( ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0001 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_NOP } :
02314     // STOP
02315     ( ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0010 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_STOP } :
02316     // RTE,RTR
02317     ( ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0011 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0111 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_RTE_RTR } :
02318     // RTS
02319     ( ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0101 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_RTS } :
02320     // TRAPV
02321     ( ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0110 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_TRAPV } :
02322     // JSR
02323     ( ir[15:6] == 10'b0100_1110_10 && (ir[5:3] == 3'b010 || ir[5:3] == 3'b101 || ir[5:3] == 3'b110 || ir[5:3] == 3'b111) &&
02324         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02325             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011))
02326     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_JSR } :
02327     // JMP
02328     ( ir[15:6] == 10'b0100_1110_11 && (ir[5:3] == 3'b010 || ir[5:3] == 3'b101 || ir[5:3] == 3'b110 || ir[5:3] == 3'b111) &&
02329         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02330             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011))
02331     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_JMP } :
02332     // ADDQ,SUBQ not An
02333     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02334         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001))
02335     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_ADDQ_SUBQ_not_An } :
02336     // ADDQ,SUBQ An
02337     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[7:6] != 2'b00 && ir[5:3] == 3'b001 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_ADDQ_SUBQ_An } :
02338     // Scc
02339     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02340         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001))
02341     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_Scc } :
02342     // DBcc
02343     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[5:3] == 3'b001 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_DBcc } :
02344     // BSR
02345     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0110 && ir[11:8] == 4'b0001 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_BSR } :
02346     // Bcc,BRA
02347     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0110 && ir[11:8] != 4'b0001 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_Bcc_BRA } :
02348     // MOVEQ
02349     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0111 && ir[8] == 1'b0 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_MOVEQ } :
02350     // CMP
02351     ( (ir[15:12] == 4'b1011) && (ir[8:6] == 3'b000 || ir[8:6] == 3'b001 || ir[8:6] == 3'b010) &&
02352         (ir[8:6] != 3'b000 || ir[5:3] != 3'b001) &&
02353         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02354             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_100))
02355     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_CMP } :
02356     // CMPA
02357     ( (ir[15:12] == 4'b1011) && (ir[8:6] == 3'b011 || ir[8:6] == 3'b111) &&
02358         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02359             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_100))
02360     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_CMPA } :
02361     // CMPM
02362     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 && (ir[8:6] == 3'b100 || ir[8:6] == 3'b101 || ir[8:6] == 3'b110) && ir[5:3] == 3'b001) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_CMPM } :
02363     // EOR
02364     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 && (ir[8:6] == 3'b100 || ir[8:6] == 3'b101 || ir[8:6] == 3'b110) && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02365         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001))
02366     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_EOR } :
02367     // ADD to mem,SUB to mem,AND to mem,OR to mem
02368     (     (ir[15:12] == 4'b1101 || ir[15:12] == 4'b1001 || ir[15:12] == 4'b1100 || ir[15:12] == 4'b1000) &&
02369         (ir[8:4] == 5'b10001 || ir[8:4] == 5'b10010 || ir[8:4] == 5'b10011 ||
02370          ir[8:4] == 5'b10101 || ir[8:4] == 5'b10110 || ir[8:4] == 5'b10111 ||
02371          ir[8:4] == 5'b11001 || ir[8:4] == 5'b11010 || ir[8:4] == 5'b11011) &&
02372         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001))
02373     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_ADD_to_mem_SUB_to_mem_AND_to_mem_OR_to_mem } :
02374     // ADD to Dn,SUB to Dn,AND to Dn,OR to Dn
02375     (     (ir[15:12] == 4'b1101 || ir[15:12] == 4'b1001 || ir[15:12] == 4'b1100 || ir[15:12] == 4'b1000) &&
02376         (ir[8:6] == 3'b000 || ir[8:6] == 3'b001 || ir[8:6] == 3'b010) &&
02377         (ir[12] != 1'b1 || ir[8:6] != 3'b000 || ir[5:3] != 3'b001) && (ir[12] == 1'b1 || ir[5:3] != 3'b001) &&
02378         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02379             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_100))
02380     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_ADD_to_Dn_SUB_to_Dn_AND_to_Dn_OR_to_Dn } :
02381     // ADDA,SUBA
02382     ( (ir[15:12] == 4'b1101 || ir[15:12] == 4'b1001) && (ir[8:6] == 3'b011 || ir[8:6] == 3'b111) &&
02383         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02384             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_100))
02385     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_ADDA_SUBA } :
02386     // ABCD,SBCD,ADDX,SUBX
02387     (     ((ir[15:12] == 4'b1100 || ir[15:12] == 4'b1000) && ir[8:4] == 5'b10000) ||
02388         ((ir[15:12] == 4'b1101 || ir[15:12] == 4'b1001) && (ir[8:4] == 5'b10000 || ir[8:4] == 5'b10100 || ir[8:4] == 5'b11000) ) ) ?
02389         { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_ABCD_SBCD_ADDX_SUBX } :
02390     // EXG
02391     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b1100 && (ir[8:3] == 6'b101000 || ir[8:3] == 6'b101001 || ir[8:3] == 6'b110001) ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_EXG } :
02392     // MULS,MULU,DIVS,DIVU
02393     ( (ir[15:12] == 4'b1100 || ir[15:12] == 4'b1000) && ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02394         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02395             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_100))
02396     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_MULS_MULU_DIVS_DIVU } :
02397     // ASL,LSL,ROL,ROXL,ASR,LSR,ROR,ROXR all memory
02398     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b1110 && ir[11] == 1'b0 && ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[5:3] != 3'b000 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02399         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001))
02400     ) ?  { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_ASL_LSL_ROL_ROXL_ASR_LSR_ROR_ROXR_all_memory } :
02401     // ASL,LSL,ROL,ROXL,ASR,LSR,ROR,ROXR all immediate/register
02402     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b1110 && (ir[7:6] == 2'b00 || ir[7:6] == 2'b01 || ir[7:6] == 2'b10) ) ?
02403         { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_ASL_LSL_ROL_ROXL_ASR_LSR_ROR_ROXR_all_immediate_register } :
02404 
02405     // else
02406 
02407     { ILLEGAL_INSTRUCTION_TRAP, UNUSED_MICROPC }
02408 ;
02409 
02410 // load ea
02411 assign load_ea =
02412     (
02413         (ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL && (ea_mod == 3'b000 || ea_mod == 3'b001 || (ea_mod == 3'b111 && ea_reg == 3'b100))) ||
02414         (ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATAALTER && ea_mod == 3'b000) ||
02415         (ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DN_AN && (ea_mod == 3'b000 || ea_mod == 3'b001)) ||
02416         (ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA && (ea_mod == 3'b000 || (ea_mod == 3'b111 && ea_reg == 3'b100)))
02417     ) ? 9'd0 // no ea needed
02418     :
02419     (ea_mod == 3'b010 && (
02420         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL_POSTINC || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROLALTER_PREDEC ||
02421         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATAALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_MEMORYALTER ||
02422         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA
02423     )) ? `MICROPC_LOAD_EA_An // (An)
02424     :
02425     (ea_mod == 3'b011 && (
02426         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL_POSTINC || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_MEMORYALTER ||
02427         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATAALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA
02428     )) ? `MICROPC_LOAD_EA_An_plus // (An)+
02429     :
02430     (ea_mod == 3'b100 && (
02431         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROLALTER_PREDEC || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATAALTER ||
02432         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_MEMORYALTER ||    ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA
02433     )) ? `MICROPC_LOAD_EA_minus_An // -(An)
02434     :
02435     (ea_mod == 3'b101 && (
02436         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL_POSTINC || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROLALTER_PREDEC ||
02437         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL ||    ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATAALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_MEMORYALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA
02438     )) ? `MICROPC_LOAD_EA_d16_An // (d16, An)
02439     :
02440     (ea_mod == 3'b110 && (
02441         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL_POSTINC || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROLALTER_PREDEC ||
02442         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATAALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_MEMORYALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA
02443     )) ? `MICROPC_LOAD_EA_d8_An_Xn // (d8, An, Xn)
02444     :
02445     (ea_mod == 3'b111 && ea_reg == 3'b000 && (
02446         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL_POSTINC || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROLALTER_PREDEC ||
02447         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL ||    ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATAALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_MEMORYALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA
02448     )) ? `MICROPC_LOAD_EA_xxx_W // (xxx).W
02449     :
02450     (ea_mod == 3'b111 && ea_reg == 3'b001 && (
02451         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL_POSTINC || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROLALTER_PREDEC ||
02452         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATAALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_MEMORYALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA
02453     )) ? `MICROPC_LOAD_EA_xxx_L // (xxx).L
02454     :
02455     (ea_mod == 3'b111 && ea_reg == 3'b010 && (
02456         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL_POSTINC || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA
02457     )) ? `MICROPC_LOAD_EA_d16_PC // (d16, PC)
02458     :
02459     (ea_mod == 3'b111 && ea_reg == 3'b011 && (
02460         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL_POSTINC || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA
02461     )) ? `MICROPC_LOAD_EA_d8_PC_Xn // (d8, PC, Xn)
02462     :
02463     `MICROPC_LOAD_EA_illegal_command // illegal command
02464 ;
02465 
02466 // perform ea read
02467 assign perform_ea_read =
02468     ( ea_mod == 3'b000 && (ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATAALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DN_AN ||
02469       ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA) ) ?
02470         `MICROPC_PERFORM_EA_READ_Dn :
02471     ( ea_mod == 3'b001 && (ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DN_AN) ) ? `MICROPC_PERFORM_EA_READ_An :
02472     ( ea_mod == 3'b111 && ea_reg == 3'b100 && (ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA) ) ?
02473         `MICROPC_PERFORM_EA_READ_imm :
02474     `MICROPC_PERFORM_EA_READ_memory
02475 ;
02476 
02477 // perform ea write
02478 assign perform_ea_write =
02479     ( ea_mod == 3'b000 && (ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATAALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DN_AN ||
02480       ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA) ) ?
02481         `MICROPC_PERFORM_EA_WRITE_Dn :
02482     ( ea_mod == 3'b001 && (ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DN_AN) ) ? `MICROPC_PERFORM_EA_WRITE_An :
02483     `MICROPC_PERFORM_EA_WRITE_memory
02484 ;
02485 
02486 // save ea
02487 assign save_ea =
02488     (ea_mod == 3'b011 && (
02489         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL_POSTINC || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_MEMORYALTER ||
02490         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATAALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA
02491     )) ? `MICROPC_SAVE_EA_An_plus // (An)+
02492     :
02493     (ea_mod == 3'b100 && (
02494         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROLALTER_PREDEC || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATAALTER ||
02495         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_MEMORYALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA
02496     )) ? `MICROPC_SAVE_EA_minus_An // -(An)
02497     :
02498     9'd0 // no ea needed
02499 ;
02500 
02501 endmodule
02502 
02503 /***********************************************************************************************************************
02504   Condition
02505  ***********************************************************************************************************************/
02506 
02507 /*! \brief Condition tests.
02508  
02509   The condition module implements the condition tests of the MC68000. Its inputs are the condition codes
02510   and the currently selected test. The output is binary: the test is true or false. The output of the condition module
02511   is an input to the microcode_branch module, that decides which microcode word to execute next.
02512  */
02513 module condition(
02514     input [3:0] cond,
02515     input [7:0] ccr,
02516     output condition
02517 );
02518 
02519 wire C,V,Z,N;
02520 assign C = ccr[0];
02521 assign V = ccr[1];
02522 assign Z = ccr[2];
02523 assign N = ccr[3];
02524 
02525 assign condition =  (cond == 4'b0000) ? 1'b1 :                              // true
02526                     (cond == 4'b0001) ? 1'b0 :                              // false
02527                     (cond == 4'b0010) ? ~C & ~Z    :                        // high
02528                     (cond == 4'b0011) ? C | Z :                             // low or same
02529                     (cond == 4'b0100) ? ~C :                                // carry clear
02530                     (cond == 4'b0101) ? C :                                 // carry set
02531                     (cond == 4'b0110) ? ~Z :                                // not equal
02532                     (cond == 4'b0111) ? Z :                                 // equal
02533                     (cond == 4'b1000) ? ~V :                                // overflow clear
02534                     (cond == 4'b1001) ? V :                                 // overflow set
02535                     (cond == 4'b1010) ? ~N :                                // plus
02536                     (cond == 4'b1011) ? N :                                 // minus
02537                     (cond == 4'b1100) ? (N & V) | (~N & ~V) :               // greater or equal
02538                     (cond == 4'b1101) ? (N & ~V) | (~N & V)    :            // less than
02539                     (cond == 4'b1110) ? (N & V & ~Z) | (~N & ~V & ~Z) :     // greater than
02540                     (cond == 4'b1111) ? (Z) | (N & ~V) | (~N & V) :         // less or equal
02541                     1'b0;
02542 endmodule
02543 
02544 /***********************************************************************************************************************
02545   ALU
02546  ***********************************************************************************************************************/
02547 
02548 /*! \brief Arithmetic and Logic Unit.
02549  
02550   The alu module is responsible for performing all of the arithmetic and logic operations of the ao68000 processor.
02551   It operates on two 32-bit registers: operand1 and operand2 from the registers module. The output is saved into
02552   a result 32-bit register. This register is located in the alu module.
02553   
02554   The alu module also contains the status register (SR) with the condition code register. The microcode decides what
02555   operation the alu performs.
02556  */
02557 module alu(
02558     input clock,
02559     input reset_n,
02560 
02561     // only zero bit
02562     input [31:0] address,
02563     // only ir[11:9] and ir[6]
02564     input [15:0] ir,
02565     // byte 2'b00, word 2'b01, long 2'b10
02566     input [1:0] size,
02567 
02568     input [31:0] operand1,
02569     input [31:0] operand2,
02570 
02571     input [2:0] interrupt_mask,
02572     input [4:0] alu_control,
02573 
02574     output reg [15:0] sr,
02575     output reg [31:0] result,
02576     output reg [1:0] special = 2'b00
02577 );
02578 
02579 wire [31:0] divu_quotient;
02580 wire [15:0] divu_remainder;
02581 wire [31:0] divs_quotient;
02582 wire [15:0] divs_remainder;
02583 wire [31:0] mulu_result;
02584 wire [31:0] muls_result;
02585 
02586 //****************************************************** Altera-specific multiplication and division modules START
02587 /* Multiplication and division modules.
02588  
02589   Currently this module contains <em>lpm_divide</em> and <em>lpm_mult</em> instantiations
02590   from Altera Megafunction/LPM library.
02591  
02592   There are separate modules for:
02593    - unsigned multiplication,
02594    - signed multiplication,
02595    - unsigned division,
02596    - singed division.
02597  */
02598 
02599 // DIVU: 32-bit operand1 unsigned / 16-bit operand2 unsigned = {16-bit remainer unsigned, 16-bit quotient unsigned}
02600 // DIVU: division by 0: trap,   overflow when quotient > 16-bit signed integer, operands not affected
02601 lpm_divide divu_inst(
02602     .clock(clock),
02603     .numer(operand1[31:0]),
02604     .denom(operand2[15:0]),
02605     .quotient(divu_quotient),
02606     .remain(divu_remainder)
02607 );
02608 defparam
02609     divu_inst.lpm_widthn = 32,
02610     divu_inst.lpm_widthd = 16,
02611     divu_inst.lpm_nrepresentation = "UNSIGNED",
02612     divu_inst.lpm_drepresentation = "UNSIGNED",
02613     divu_inst.lpm_hint = "LPM_REMAINDERPOSITIVE=TRUE",
02614     divu_inst.lpm_pipeline = 30;
02615 
02616 // DIVS: 32-bit operand1 signed / 16-bit operand2 signed = {16-bit remainer signed = sign of dividend, 16-bit quotient signed}
02617 // DIVS: division by 0: trap,   overflow when quotient > 16-bit signed integer, operands not affected
02618 lpm_divide divs_inst(
02619     .clock(clock),
02620     .numer(operand1[31:0]),
02621     .denom(operand2[15:0]),
02622     .quotient(divs_quotient),
02623     .remain(divs_remainder)
02624 );
02625 defparam
02626     divs_inst.lpm_widthn = 32,
02627     divs_inst.lpm_widthd = 16,
02628     divs_inst.lpm_nrepresentation = "SIGNED",
02629     divs_inst.lpm_drepresentation = "SIGNED",
02630     divs_inst.lpm_hint = "LPM_REMAINDERPOSITIVE=FALSE",
02631     divs_inst.lpm_pipeline = 30;
02632 
02633 // MULU: 16-bit operand1[15:0] unsigned * 16-bit operand2 unsigned = 32-bit result unsigned
02634 lpm_mult mulu_inst(
02635     .clock(clock),
02636     .dataa(operand1[15:0]),
02637     .datab(operand2[15:0]),
02638     .result(mulu_result)
02639 );
02640 defparam
02641     mulu_inst.lpm_widtha = 16,
02642     mulu_inst.lpm_widthb = 16,
02643     mulu_inst.lpm_widthp = 32,
02644     mulu_inst.lpm_representation = "UNSIGNED",
02645     mulu_inst.lpm_pipeline = 18;
02646 
02647 // MULS: 16-bit operand1[15:0] signed * 16-bit operand2 signed = 32-bit result signed
02648 lpm_mult muls_inst(
02649     .clock(clock),
02650     .dataa(operand1[15:0]),
02651     .datab(operand2[15:0]),
02652     .result(muls_result)
02653 );
02654 defparam
02655     muls_inst.lpm_widtha = 16,
02656     muls_inst.lpm_widthb = 16,
02657     muls_inst.lpm_widthp = 32,
02658     muls_inst.lpm_representation = "SIGNED",
02659     muls_inst.lpm_pipeline = 18;
02660 //****************************************************** Altera-specific multiplication and division modules END
02661 
02662 // ALU internal defines
02663 `define Sm ( (size == 2'b00) ? operand2[7] : (size == 2'b01) ? operand2[15] : operand2[31])
02664 
02665 `define Dm ( (size == 2'b00) ? operand1[7] : (size == 2'b01) ? operand1[15] : operand1[31])
02666 
02667 `define Rm ( (size == 2'b00) ? result[7] : (size == 2'b01) ? result[15] : result[31])
02668 
02669 `define Z (    (size == 2'b00) ? (result[7:0] == 8'b0) : (size == 2'b01) ? (result[15:0] == 16'b0) : (result[31:0] == 32'b0))
02670 
02671 // ALU operations
02672 
02673 reg [2:0] interrupt_mask_copy;
02674 reg was_interrupt;
02675 
02676 always @(posedge clock or negedge reset_n) begin
02677     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
02678         sr <= { 1'b0, 1'b0, 1'b1, 2'b0, 3'b111, 8'b0 };
02679         result <= 32'd0;
02680         special <= 2'b0;
02681         interrupt_mask_copy <= 3'b0;
02682         was_interrupt <= 1'b0;
02683     end
02684     else begin
02685         case(alu_control)
02686             `ALU_SR_SET_INTERRUPT: begin
02687                 interrupt_mask_copy <= interrupt_mask[2:0];
02688                 was_interrupt <= 1'b1;
02689             end
02690 
02691             `ALU_SR_SET_TRAP: begin
02692                 if(was_interrupt == 1'b1) begin
02693                     sr <= { 1'b0, sr[14], 1'b1, sr[12:11], interrupt_mask_copy[2:0], sr[7:0] };
02694                 end
02695                 else begin
02696                     sr <= { 1'b0, sr[14], 1'b1, sr[12:0] };
02697                 end
02698                 was_interrupt <= 1'b0;
02699             end
02700 
02701             `ALU_MOVEP_M2R_1: begin
02702                 if(ir[6] == 1'b1)   result[31:24] <= operand1[7:0];
02703                 else                result[15:8] <= operand1[7:0];
02704                 //CCR: no change
02705             end
02706             `ALU_MOVEP_M2R_2: begin
02707                 if(ir[6] == 1'b1)   result[23:16] <= operand1[7:0];
02708                 else                result[7:0] <= operand1[7:0];
02709                 //CCR: no change
02710             end
02711             `ALU_MOVEP_M2R_3: begin
02712                 if(ir[6] == 1'b1)   result[15:8] <= operand1[7:0];
02713                 //CCR: no change
02714             end
02715             `ALU_MOVEP_M2R_4: begin
02716                 if(ir[6] == 1'b1)   result[7:0] <= operand1[7:0];
02717                 //CCR: no change
02718             end
02719             
02720 
02721             `ALU_MOVEP_R2M_1: begin
02722                 if(ir[6] == 1'b1)   result[7:0] <= operand1[31:24];
02723                 else                result[7:0] <= operand1[15:8];
02724                 // CCR: no change
02725             end
02726             `ALU_MOVEP_R2M_2: begin
02727                 if(ir[6] == 1'b1)   result[7:0] <= operand1[23:16];
02728                 else                result[7:0] <= operand1[7:0];
02729                 // CCR: no change
02730             end
02731             `ALU_MOVEP_R2M_3: begin
02732                 result[7:0] <= operand1[15:8];
02733                 // CCR: no change
02734             end
02735             `ALU_MOVEP_R2M_4: begin
02736                 result[7:0] <= operand1[7:0];
02737                 // CCR: no change
02738             end
02739 
02740             
02741 
02742             `ALU_SIGN_EXTEND: begin
02743                 // move operand1 with sign-extension to result
02744                 if(size == 2'b01) begin
02745                     result <= { {16{operand1[15]}}, operand1[15:0] };
02746                 end
02747                 else begin
02748                     result <= operand1;
02749                 end
02750                 // CCR: no change
02751             end
02752 
02753             `ALU_ARITHMETIC_LOGIC: begin
02754 
02755                 // OR,OR to mem,OR to Dn
02756                 if(         (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b000) ||
02757                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1000)
02758                 )             result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] | operand2[31:0];
02759                 // AND,AND to mem,AND to Dn
02760                 else if(     (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b001) ||
02761                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1100)
02762                 )             result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] & operand2[31:0];
02763                 // EORI,EOR
02764                 else if(     (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b101) ||
02765                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 && (ir[8:6] == 3'b100 || ir[8:6] == 3'b101 || ir[8:6] == 3'b110) && ir[5:3] != 3'b001)
02766                 )            result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] ^ operand2[31:0];
02767                 // ADD,ADD to mem,ADD to Dn,ADDQ
02768                 else if(     (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b011) ||
02769                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1101) ||
02770                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[8] == 1'b0)
02771                 )             result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] + operand2[31:0];
02772                 // SUBI,CMPI,CMPM,SUB to mem,SUB to Dn,CMP,SUBQ
02773                 else if(     (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b010) ||
02774                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b110) ||
02775                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 && (ir[8:6] == 3'b100 || ir[8:6] == 3'b101 || ir[8:6] == 3'b110) && ir[5:3] == 3'b001)     ||
02776                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1001) ||
02777                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 && (ir[8:6] == 3'b000 || ir[8:6] == 3'b001 || ir[8:6] == 3'b010)) ||
02778                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[8] == 1'b1)
02779                 )            result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] - operand2[31:0];
02780 
02781                 // Z
02782                 sr[2] <= `Z;
02783                 // N
02784                 sr[3] <= `Rm;
02785 
02786                 // CMPI,CMPM,CMP
02787                 if( (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b110) ||
02788                     (ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 && (ir[8:6] == 3'b100 || ir[8:6] == 3'b101 || ir[8:6] == 3'b110) && ir[5:3] == 3'b001) ||
02789                     (ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 && (ir[8:6] == 3'b000 || ir[8:6] == 3'b001 || ir[8:6] == 3'b010))
02790                 ) begin
02791                     // C,V
02792                     sr[0] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm);
02793                     sr[1] <= (~`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
02794                     // X not affected
02795                 end
02796                 // ADDI,ADD to mem,ADD to Dn,ADDQ
02797                 else if(     (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b011) ||
02798                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1101) ||
02799                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[8] == 1'b0)
02800                 ) begin
02801                     // C,X,V
02802                     sr[0] <= (`Sm & `Dm) | (~`Rm & `Dm) | (`Sm & ~`Rm);
02803                     sr[4] <= (`Sm & `Dm) | (~`Rm & `Dm) | (`Sm & ~`Rm); //=ccr[0];
02804                     sr[1] <= (`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (~`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
02805                 end
02806                 // SUBI,SUB to mem,SUB to Dn,SUBQ
02807                 else if(     (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b010) ||
02808                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1001) ||
02809                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[8] == 1'b1)
02810                 ) begin
02811                     // C,X,V
02812                     sr[0] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm);
02813                     sr[4] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm); //=ccr[0];
02814                     sr[1] <= (~`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
02815                 end
02816                 // ANDI,EORI,ORI,EOR,OR to mem,AND to mem,OR to Dn,AND to Dn
02817                 else begin
02818                     // C,V
02819                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
02820                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;
02821                     // X not affected
02822                 end
02823             end
02824 
02825             `ALU_ABCD_SBCD_ADDX_SUBX: begin // 259 LE
02826                 // ABCD
02827                 if( ir[14:12] == 3'b100 ) begin
02828                     result[13:8] = {1'b0, operand1[3:0]} + {1'b0, operand2[3:0]} + {4'b0, sr[4]};
02829                     result[19:14] = {1'b0, operand1[7:4]} + {1'b0, operand2[7:4]};
02830                     
02831                     result[31:23] = operand1[7:0] + operand2[7:0] + {7'b0, sr[4]};
02832                     
02833                     result[13:8] = (result[13:8] > 6'd9) ? (result[13:8] + 6'd6) : result[13:8];
02834                     result[19:14] = (result[13:8] > 6'h1F) ? (result[19:14] + 6'd2) :
02835                                     (result[13:8] > 6'h0F) ? (result[19:14] + 6'd1) :
02836                                     result[19:14];
02837                     result[19:14] = (result[19:14] > 6'd9) ? (result[19:14] + 6'd6) : result[19:14];
02838                     
02839                     result[7:4] = result[17:14];
02840                     result[3:0] = result[11:8];
02841                     
02842                     // C
02843                     sr[0] <= (result[19:14] > 6'd9) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
02844                     // X = C
02845                     sr[4] <= (result[19:14] > 6'd9) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
02846                     
02847                     // V
02848                     sr[1] <= (result[30] == 1'b0 && result[7] == 1'b1) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
02849                 end
02850                 // SBCD
02851                 else if( ir[14:12] == 3'b000 ) begin
02852                 
02853                     result[13:8] = 6'd32 + {2'b0, operand1[3:0]} - {2'b0, operand2[3:0]} - {5'b0, sr[4]};
02854                     result[19:14] = 6'd32 + {2'b0, operand1[7:4]} - {2'b0, operand2[7:4]};
02855                     
02856                     result[31:23] = operand1[7:0] - operand2[7:0] - {7'b0, sr[4]};
02857                     
02858                     result[13:8] = (result[13:8] < 6'd32) ? (result[13:8] - 6'd6) : result[13:8];
02859                     result[19:14] = (result[13:8] < 6'd16) ? (result[19:14] - 6'd2) :
02860                                     (result[13:8] < 6'd32) ? (result[19:14] - 6'd1) :
02861                                     result[19:14];
02862                     result[19:14] = (result[19:14] < 6'd32 && result[31] == 1'b1) ? (result[19:14] - 6'd6) : result[19:14];
02863                     
02864                     result[7:4] = result[17:14];
02865                     result[3:0] = result[11:8];
02866                 
02867                     // C
02868                     sr[0] <= (result[19:14] < 6'd32) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
02869                     // X = C
02870                     sr[4] <= (result[19:14] < 6'd32) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
02871                     
02872                     // V
02873                     sr[1] <= (result[30] == 1'b1 && result[7] == 1'b0) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
02874                 end
02875                 // ADDX
02876                 else if( ir[14:12] == 3'b101 ) result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] + operand2[31:0] + sr[4];
02877                 // SUBX
02878                 else if( ir[14:12] == 3'b001 ) result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] - operand2[31:0] - sr[4];
02879 
02880                 // Z
02881                 sr[2] <= sr[2] & `Z;
02882                 // N
02883                 sr[3] <= `Rm;
02884 
02885                 // ADDX
02886                 if(ir[14:12] == 3'b101 ) begin
02887                     // C,X,V
02888                     sr[0] <= (`Sm & `Dm) | (~`Rm & `Dm) | (`Sm & ~`Rm);
02889                     sr[4] <= (`Sm & `Dm) | (~`Rm & `Dm) | (`Sm & ~`Rm); //=ccr[0];
02890                     sr[1] <= (`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (~`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
02891                 end
02892                 // SUBX
02893                 else if(ir[14:12] == 3'b001 ) begin
02894                     // C,X,V
02895                     sr[0] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm);
02896                     sr[4] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm); //=ccr[0];
02897                     sr[1] <= (~`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
02898                 end
02899             end
02900 
02901             `ALU_ASL_LSL_ROL_ROXL_ASR_LSR_ROR_ROXR_prepare: begin
02902 
02903                 if(size == 2'b00) result[7:0] = operand1[7:0];
02904                 else if(size == 2'b01) result[15:0] = operand1[15:0];
02905                 else if(size == 2'b10) result[31:0] = operand1[31:0];
02906 
02907                 // X for ASL
02908                 //if(operand2[5:0] > 6'b0 && ir[8] == 1'b1 && ((ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[10:9] == 2'b00) || (ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[4:3] == 2'b00)) ) begin
02909                     // X set to Dm
02910                 //    sr[4] <= `Dm;
02911                 //end
02912                 // else X not affected
02913 
02914                 // V cleared
02915                 sr[1] <= 1'b0;
02916                 // C for ROXL,ROXR: set to X
02917                 if( (ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[10:9] == 2'b10) || (ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[4:3] == 2'b10) ) begin
02918                     sr[0] <= sr[4];
02919                 end
02920                 else begin
02921                     // C cleared
02922                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
02923                 end
02924 
02925                 // N set
02926                 sr[3] <= `Rm;
02927                 // Z set
02928                 sr[2] <= `Z;
02929             end
02930 
02931             `ALU_ASL_LSL_ROL_ROXL_ASR_LSR_ROR_ROXR: begin
02932 
02933                 // ASL
02934                 if( ((ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[10:9] == 2'b00) || (ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[4:3] == 2'b00)) && ir[8] == 1'b1) begin
02935                     result[31:0] = {operand1[30:0], 1'b0};
02936 
02937                     sr[1] <= (sr[1] == 1'b0)? (`Rm != `Dm) : 1'b1; // V
02938                     sr[0] <= `Dm;           // C
02939                     sr[4] <= `Dm;           // X
02940                 end
02941                 // LSL
02942                 else if( ((ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[10:9] == 2'b01) || (ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[4:3] == 2'b01)) && ir[8] == 1'b1) begin
02943                     result[31:0] = {operand1[30:0], 1'b0};
02944 
02945                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;          // V
02946                     sr[0] <= `Dm;           // C
02947                     sr[4] <= `Dm;           // X
02948                 end
02949                 // ROL
02950                 else if( ((ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[10:9] == 2'b11) || (ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[4:3] == 2'b11)) && ir[8] == 1'b1) begin
02951                     result[31:0] = {operand1[30:0], `Dm};
02952 
02953                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;          // V
02954                     sr[0] <= `Dm;           // C
02955                                             // X not affected
02956                 end
02957                 // ROXL
02958                 else if( ((ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[10:9] == 2'b10) || (ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[4:3] == 2'b10)) && ir[8] == 1'b1) begin
02959                     result[31:0] = {operand1[30:0], sr[4]};
02960 
02961                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;          // V
02962                     sr[0] <= `Dm;           // C
02963                     sr[4] <= `Dm;           // X
02964                 end
02965                 // ASR
02966                 else if( ((ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[10:9] == 2'b00) || (ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[4:3] == 2'b00)) && ir[8] == 1'b0) begin
02967                     if(size == 2'b00)         result[7:0] = { operand1[7], operand1[7:1] };
02968                     else if(size == 2'b01)    result[15:0] = { operand1[15], operand1[15:1] };
02969                     else if(size == 2'b10)    result[31:0] = { operand1[31], operand1[31:1] };
02970 
02971                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;          // V
02972                     sr[0] <= operand1[0];   // C
02973                     sr[4] <= operand1[0];   // X
02974                 end
02975                 // LSR
02976                 else if( ((ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[10:9] == 2'b01) || (ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[4:3] == 2'b01)) && ir[8] == 1'b0) begin
02977                     if(size == 2'b00)         result[7:0] = { 1'b0, operand1[7:1] };
02978                     else if(size == 2'b01)    result[15:0] = { 1'b0, operand1[15:1] };
02979                     else if(size == 2'b10)    result[31:0] = { 1'b0, operand1[31:1] };
02980 
02981                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;          // V
02982                     sr[0] <= operand1[0];   // C
02983                     sr[4] <= operand1[0];   // X
02984                 end
02985                 // ROR
02986                 else if( ((ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[10:9] == 2'b11) || (ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[4:3] == 2'b11)) && ir[8] == 1'b0) begin
02987                     if(size == 2'b00)         result[7:0] = { operand1[0], operand1[7:1] };
02988                     else if(size == 2'b01)    result[15:0] = { operand1[0], operand1[15:1] };
02989                     else if(size == 2'b10)    result[31:0] = { operand1[0], operand1[31:1] };
02990 
02991                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;          // V
02992                     sr[0] <= operand1[0];   // C
02993                     // X not affected
02994                 end
02995                 // ROXR
02996                 else if( ((ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[10:9] == 2'b10) || (ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[4:3] == 2'b10)) && ir[8] == 1'b0) begin
02997                     if(size == 2'b00)         result[7:0] = {sr[4], operand1[7:1]};
02998                     else if(size == 2'b01)    result[15:0] = {sr[4], operand1[15:1]};
02999                     else if(size == 2'b10)    result[31:0] = {sr[4], operand1[31:1]};
03000 
03001                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;          // V
03002                     sr[0] <= operand1[0];   // C
03003                     sr[4] <= operand1[0];   // X
03004                 end
03005 
03006                 // N set
03007                 sr[3] <= `Rm;
03008                 // Z set
03009                 sr[2] <= `Z;
03010             end
03011 
03012             `ALU_MOVE: begin
03013                 result = operand1;
03014 
03015                 // X not affected
03016                 // C cleared
03017                 sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03018                 // V cleared
03019                 sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03020 
03021                 // N set
03022                 sr[3] <= `Rm;
03023                 // Z set
03024                 sr[2] <= `Z;
03025             end
03026 
03027             `ALU_ADDA_SUBA_CMPA_ADDQ_SUBQ: begin
03028                 // ADDA: 1101
03029                 // CMPA: 1011
03030                 // SUBA: 1001
03031                 // ADDQ,SUBQ: 0101 xxx0,1
03032                 // operation requires that operand2 was sign extended
03033                 
03034                 // ADDA,ADDQ
03035                 if( ir[15:12] == 4'b1101 || (ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[8] == 1'b0) )
03036                     result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] + operand2[31:0];
03037                 // SUBA,CMPA,SUBQ
03038                 else if( ir[15:12] == 4'b1001 || ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 || (ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[8] == 1'b1) )
03039                     result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] - operand2[31:0];
03040                 
03041                 // for CMPA
03042                 if( ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 ) begin
03043                     // Z
03044                     sr[2] <= `Z;
03045                     // N
03046                     sr[3] <= `Rm;
03047 
03048                     // C,V
03049                     sr[0] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm);
03050                     sr[1] <= (~`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
03051                     // X not affected
03052                 end
03053                 // for ADDA,SUBA,ADDQ,SUBQ: ccr not affected
03054             end
03055 
03056             `ALU_CHK: begin
03057                 result[15:0] = operand1[15:0] - operand2[15:0];
03058                 
03059                 // undocumented behavior: Z flag, see 68knotes.txt
03060                 //sr[2] <= (operand1[15:0] == 16'b0) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
03061                 // undocumented behavior: C,V flags, see 68knotes.txt
03062                 //sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03063                 //sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03064                 
03065                 // C,X,V
03066                 //    sr[0] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm);
03067                 //    sr[4] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm); //=ccr[0];
03068                 //    sr[1] <= (~`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
03069                 // +: 0-1,    0-0=0, 1-1=0
03070                 // -: 0-0=1,  1-0,   1-1=1
03071                 // operand1 - operand2 > 0
03072                 if( operand1[15:0] != operand2[15:0] && ((~`Dm & `Sm) | (~`Dm & ~`Sm & ~`Rm) | (`Dm & `Sm & ~`Rm)) == 1'b1 ) begin
03073                     // clear N
03074                     sr[3] <= 1'b0;
03075                     special <= 2'b01;
03076                 end
03077                 // operand1 < 0
03078                 else if( operand1[15] == 1'b1 ) begin
03079                     // set N
03080                     sr[3] <= 1'b1;
03081                     special <= 2'b01;
03082                 end
03083                 // no trap
03084                 else begin
03085                     // N undefined: not affected
03086                     special <= 2'b00;
03087                 end
03088 
03089                 // X not affected
03090             end
03091 
03092             `ALU_MULS_MULU_DIVS_DIVU: begin // 2206 LE, 106 MHz
03093 
03094                 // division by 0
03095                 if( ir[15:12] == 4'b1000 && operand2[15:0] == 16'b0 ) begin
03096                     // X not affected
03097                     // C cleared
03098                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03099                     // V,Z,N undefined: cleared
03100                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03101                     sr[2] <= 1'b0;
03102                     sr[3] <= 1'b0;
03103 
03104                     // set trap
03105                     special <= 2'b01;
03106                 end
03107                 // division overflow: divu, divs
03108                 else if(     ((ir[15:12] == 4'b1000 && ir[8] == 1'b0) && (divu_quotient[31:16] != 16'd0)) ||
03109                             ((ir[15:12] == 4'b1000 && ir[8] == 1'b1) && (divs_quotient[31:16] != {16{divs_quotient[15]}}))
03110                 ) begin
03111                     // X not affected
03112                     // C cleared
03113                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03114                     // V set
03115                     sr[1] <= 1'b1;
03116                     // Z,N undefined: cleared and set
03117                     sr[2] <= 1'b0;
03118                     sr[3] <= 1'b1;
03119 
03120                     // set trap
03121                     special <= 2'b10;
03122                 end
03123                 // division
03124                 else if( ir[15:12] == 4'b1000 ) begin
03125                     result[31:0] <= (ir[8] == 1'b0)? {divu_remainder[15:0], divu_quotient[15:0]} : {divs_remainder[15:0], divs_quotient[15:0]};
03126 
03127                     // X not affected
03128                     // C cleared
03129                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03130                     // V cleared
03131                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03132                     // Z
03133                     sr[2] <= (ir[8] == 1'b0)? (divu_quotient[15:0] == 16'b0) : (divs_quotient[15:0] == 16'b0);
03134                     // N
03135                     sr[3] <= (ir[8] == 1'b0)? (divu_quotient[15] == 1'b1) : (divs_quotient[15] == 1'b1);
03136 
03137                     // set trap
03138                     special <= 2'b00;
03139                 end
03140                 // multiplication
03141                 else if( ir[15:12] == 4'b1100 ) begin
03142                     result[31:0] <= (ir[8] == 1'b0)? mulu_result[31:0] : muls_result[31:0];
03143 
03144                     // X not affected
03145                     // C cleared
03146                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03147                     // V cleared
03148                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03149                     // Z
03150                     sr[2] <= (ir[8] == 1'b0)? (mulu_result[31:0] == 32'b0) : (muls_result[31:0] == 32'b0);
03151                     // N
03152                     sr[3] <= (ir[8] == 1'b0)? (mulu_result[31] == 1'b1) : (muls_result[31] == 1'b1);
03153 
03154                     // set trap
03155                     special <= 2'b00;
03156                 end
03157             end
03158 
03159 
03160             `ALU_BCHG_BCLR_BSET_BTST: begin // 97 LE
03161                 // byte
03162                 if( ir[5:3] != 3'b000 ) begin
03163                     sr[2] <= ~(operand1[ operand2[2:0] ]);
03164                     result = operand1;
03165                     result[ operand2[2:0] ] = (ir[7:6] == 2'b01) ? ~(operand1[ operand2[2:0] ]) : (ir[7:6] == 2'b10) ? 1'b0 : 1'b1;
03166                 end
03167                 // long
03168                 else if( ir[5:3] == 3'b000 ) begin
03169                     sr[2] <= ~(operand1[ operand2[4:0] ]);
03170                     result = operand1;
03171                     result[ operand2[4:0] ] = (ir[7:6] == 2'b01) ? ~(operand1[ operand2[4:0] ]) : (ir[7:6] == 2'b10) ? 1'b0 : 1'b1;
03172                 end
03173 
03174                 // C,V,N,X not affected
03175             end
03176 
03177             `ALU_TAS: begin
03178                 result[7:0] <= { 1'b1, operand1[6:0] };
03179 
03180                 // X not affected
03181                 // C cleared
03182                 sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03183                 // V cleared
03184                 sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03185 
03186                 // N set
03187                 sr[3] <= (operand1[7] == 1'b1);
03188                 // Z set
03189                 sr[2] <= (operand1[7:0] == 8'b0);
03190             end
03191 
03192 
03193             `ALU_NEGX_CLR_NEG_NOT_NBCD_SWAP_EXT: begin
03194                 // NEGX
03195                 if(    ir[11:8] == 4'b0000 ) result = 32'b0 - operand1[31:0] - sr[4];
03196                 // CLR
03197                 else if( ir[11:8] == 4'b0010 ) result = 32'b0;
03198                 // NEG
03199                 else if( ir[11:8] == 4'b0100 ) result = 32'b0 - operand1[31:0];
03200                 // NOT
03201                 else if( ir[11:8] == 4'b0110 ) result = ~operand1[31:0];
03202                 // NBCD
03203                 else if( ir[11:6] == 6'b1000_00 ) begin
03204                     
03205                     result[3:0] = 5'd25 - operand1[3:0];
03206                     result[7:4] = (operand1[3:0] > 4'd9) ? (5'd24 - operand1[7:4]) : (5'd25 - operand1[7:4]);
03207                     
03208                     if(sr[4] == 1'b0 && result[3:0] == 4'd9 && result[7:4] == 4'd9) begin
03209                         result[3:0] = 4'd0;
03210                         result[7:4] = 4'd0;
03211                     end
03212                     else if(sr[4] == 1'b0 && (result[3:0] == 4'd9 || result[3:0] == 4'd15)) begin
03213                         result[3:0] = 4'd0;
03214                         result[7:4] = result[7:4] + 4'd1;
03215                     end
03216                     else if(sr[4] == 1'b0) begin
03217                         result[3:0] = result[3:0] + 4'd1;
03218                     end
03219                     
03220                     //V undefined: unchanged
03221                     //Z
03222                     sr[2] <= sr[2] & `Z;
03223                     //C,X
03224                     sr[0] <= (operand1[7:0] == 8'd0 && sr[4] == 1'b0) ? 1'b0 : 1'b1;
03225                     sr[4] <= (operand1[7:0] == 8'd0 && sr[4] == 1'b0) ? 1'b0 : 1'b1; //=C
03226                 end
03227                 // SWAP
03228                 else if( ir[11:6] == 6'b1000_01 ) result = { operand1[15:0], operand1[31:16] };
03229                 // EXT byte to word
03230                 else if( ir[11:6] == 6'b1000_10 ) result = { result[31:16], {8{operand1[7]}}, operand1[7:0] };
03231                 // EXT word to long
03232                 else if( ir[11:6] == 6'b1000_11 ) result = { {16{operand1[15]}}, operand1[15:0] };
03233 
03234                 // N set if negative else clear
03235                 sr[3] <= `Rm;
03236 
03237                 // CLR,NOT,SWAP,EXT
03238                 if( ir[11:8] == 4'b0010 || ir[11:8] == 4'b0110 || ir[11:6] == 6'b1000_01 || ir[11:7] == 5'b1000_1 ) begin
03239                     // X not affected
03240                     // C,V cleared
03241                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03242                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03243                     // Z set
03244                     sr[2] <= `Z;
03245                 end
03246                 // NEGX
03247                 else if( ir[11:8] == 4'b0000 ) begin
03248                     // C set if borrow
03249                     sr[0] <= `Dm | `Rm;
03250                     // X=C
03251                     sr[4] <= `Dm | `Rm;
03252                     // V set if overflow
03253                     sr[1] <= `Dm & `Rm;
03254                     // Z cleared if nonzero else unchanged
03255                     sr[2] <= sr[2] & `Z;
03256                 end
03257                 // NEG
03258                 else if( ir[11:8] == 4'b0100 ) begin
03259                     // C clear if zero else set
03260                     sr[0] <= `Dm | `Rm;
03261                     // X=C
03262                     sr[4] <= `Dm | `Rm;
03263                     // V set if overflow
03264                     sr[1] <= `Dm & `Rm;
03265                     // Z set if zero else clear
03266                     sr[2] <= `Z;
03267                 end
03268             end
03269 
03270 
03271             `ALU_SIMPLE_LONG_ADD: begin
03272                 result <= operand1[31:0] + operand2[31:0];
03273 
03274                 // CCR not affected
03275             end
03276 
03277             `ALU_SIMPLE_LONG_SUB: begin
03278                 result <= operand1[31:0] - operand2[31:0];
03279 
03280                 // CCR not affected
03281             end
03282 
03283             `ALU_MOVE_TO_CCR_SR_RTE_RTR_STOP_LOGIC_TO_CCR_SR: begin
03284 
03285                 // MOVE TO SR,RTE,STOP,ORI to SR,ANDI to SR,EORI to SR
03286                 if( ir[15:8] == 8'b0100_0110 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0011 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0010 ||
03287                     ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_000_0_01_111100 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_001_0_01_111100 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_101_0_01_111100
03288                 )         sr <= { operand1[15], 1'b0, operand1[13], 2'b0, operand1[10:8], 3'b0, operand1[4:0] };
03289                 // MOVE TO CCR,RTR,ORI to CCR,ANDI to CCR,EORI to CCR
03290                 else if(     ir[15:8] == 8'b0100_0100 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0111 ||
03291                             ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_000_0_00_111100 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_001_0_00_111100 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_101_0_00_111100
03292                 )        sr <= { sr[15:8], 3'b0, operand1[4:0] };
03293             end
03294 
03295             `ALU_SIMPLE_MOVE: begin
03296                 result <= operand1;
03297                 
03298                 // CCR not affected
03299             end
03300             
03301             `ALU_LINK_MOVE: begin
03302                 if(ir[3:0] == 3'b111) begin
03303                     result <= operand1 - 32'd4;
03304                 end
03305                 else begin
03306                     result <= operand1;
03307                 end
03308                 
03309                 // CCR not affected
03310             end
03311 
03312         endcase
03313     end
03314 end
03315 
03316 endmodule
03317 
03318 /***********************************************************************************************************************
03319   Microcode branch
03320  ***********************************************************************************************************************/
03321 
03322 /*! \brief Select the next microcode word to execute.
03323  
03324   The microcode_branch module is responsible for selecting the next microcode word to execute. This decision is based
03325   on the value of the current microcode word, the value of the interrupt privilege level, the state of the current
03326   bus cycle and other internal signals.
03327  
03328   The microcode_branch module implements a simple stack for the microcode addresses. This makes it possible to call
03329   subroutines inside the microcode.
03330  */
03331 module microcode_branch(
03332     input clock,
03333     input reset_n,
03334 
03335     input [4:0] movem_loop,
03336     input [15:0] movem_reg,
03337     input [31:0] operand2,
03338     input [1:0] special,
03339     input condition,
03340     input [31:0] result,
03341     input overflow,
03342     input stop_flag,
03343     input [15:0] ir,
03344     input [7:0] decoder_trap,
03345     input trace_flag,
03346     input group_0_flag,
03347     input [2:0] interrupt_mask,
03348 
03349     input [8:0] load_ea,
03350     input [8:0] perform_ea_read,
03351     input [8:0] perform_ea_write,
03352     input [8:0] save_ea,
03353     input [8:0] decoder_micropc,
03354 
03355     input prefetch_ir_valid_32,
03356     input prefetch_ir_valid,
03357     input jmp_address_trap,
03358     input jmp_bus_trap,
03359     input finished,
03360 
03361     input [3:0] branch_control,
03362     input [3:0] branch_offset,
03363     output [8:0] micro_pc
03364 );
03365 
03366 reg [8:0] micro_pc_0 = 9'd0;
03367 reg [8:0] micro_pc_1;
03368 reg [8:0] micro_pc_2;
03369 reg [8:0] micro_pc_3;
03370 
03371 assign micro_pc =
03372     (reset_n == 1'b0) ? 9'd0 :
03373     (jmp_address_trap == 1'b1 || jmp_bus_trap == 1'b1) ? `MICROPC_ADDRESS_BUS_TRAP :
03374     (   (branch_control == `BRANCH_movem_loop               && movem_loop == 5'b10000) ||
03375         (branch_control == `BRANCH_movem_reg                && movem_reg[0] == 0) ||
03376         (branch_control == `BRANCH_operand2                 && operand2[5:0] == 6'b0) ||
03377         (branch_control == `BRANCH_special_01               && special != 2'b01) ||
03378         (branch_control == `BRANCH_special_10               && special == 2'b10) ||
03379         (branch_control == `BRANCH_condition_0              && condition == 1'b0) ||
03380         (branch_control == `BRANCH_condition_1              && condition == 1'b1) ||
03381         (branch_control == `BRANCH_result                   && result[15:0] == 16'hFFFF) ||
03382         (branch_control == `BRANCH_V                        && overflow == 1'b0) ||
03383         (branch_control == `BRANCH_movep_16                 && ir[6] == 1'b0) ||
03384         (branch_control == `BRANCH_stop_flag_wait_ir_decode && stop_flag == 1'b1) ||
03385         (branch_control == `BRANCH_ir                       && ir[7:0] != 8'b0) ||
03386         (branch_control == `BRANCH_trace_flag_and_interrupt && trace_flag == 1'b0 && interrupt_mask != 3'b000) ||
03387         (branch_control == `BRANCH_group_0_flag             && group_0_flag == 1'b0)
03388     ) ? micro_pc_0 + { 5'd0, branch_offset } :
03389     (branch_control == `BRANCH_stop_flag_wait_ir_decode && prefetch_ir_valid == 1'b1 && decoder_trap == 8'd0) ?         decoder_micropc :
03390     (branch_control == `BRANCH_trace_flag_and_interrupt && trace_flag == 1'b0 && interrupt_mask == 3'b000) ?            `MICROPC_MAIN_LOOP :
03391     (branch_control == `BRANCH_procedure && branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_jump_to_main_loop) ?                            `MICROPC_MAIN_LOOP :
03392     (branch_control == `BRANCH_procedure && branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_call_load_ea && load_ea != 9'd0) ?              load_ea :
03393     (branch_control == `BRANCH_procedure && branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_call_perform_ea_read) ?                         perform_ea_read :
03394     (branch_control == `BRANCH_procedure && branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_call_perform_ea_write) ?                        perform_ea_write :
03395     (branch_control == `BRANCH_procedure && branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_call_save_ea && save_ea != 9'd0) ?              save_ea :
03396 
03397     (branch_control == `BRANCH_procedure && branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_call_read && load_ea != 9'd0) ?                 load_ea :
03398     (branch_control == `BRANCH_procedure && branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_call_read && load_ea == 9'd0) ?                 perform_ea_read :
03399 
03400     (branch_control == `BRANCH_procedure && branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_call_write) ?                                   perform_ea_write :
03401 
03402     (branch_control == `BRANCH_procedure && branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_call_trap) ?                                    `MICROPC_TRAP_ENTRY :
03403     (branch_control == `BRANCH_procedure && branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_return) ?                                       micro_pc_1 :
03404     (branch_control == `BRANCH_procedure && branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_interrupt_mask && interrupt_mask == 3'b000) ?   `MICROPC_MAIN_LOOP :
03405     (    (branch_control == `BRANCH_procedure && branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_wait_finished && finished == 1'b0) ||
03406         (branch_control == `BRANCH_procedure && branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_wait_prefetch_valid && prefetch_ir_valid == 1'b0) ||
03407         (branch_control == `BRANCH_procedure && branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_wait_prefetch_valid_32 && prefetch_ir_valid_32 == 1'b0) ||
03408         (branch_control == `BRANCH_stop_flag_wait_ir_decode && prefetch_ir_valid == 1'b0)
03409     ) ? micro_pc_0 :
03410     micro_pc_0 + 9'd1
03411 ;
03412 
03413 always @(posedge clock or negedge reset_n) begin
03414     if(reset_n == 1'b0) micro_pc_0 <= 9'd0;
03415     else                micro_pc_0 <= micro_pc;
03416 end
03417 
03418 always @(posedge clock or negedge reset_n) begin
03419     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
03420         micro_pc_1 <= 9'd0;
03421         micro_pc_2 <= 9'd0;
03422         micro_pc_3 <= 9'd0;
03423     end
03424     else if(branch_control == `BRANCH_stop_flag_wait_ir_decode && prefetch_ir_valid == 1'b1 && decoder_trap == 8'd0)
03425     begin
03426         micro_pc_1 <= micro_pc_0 + { 5'd0, branch_offset };
03427         micro_pc_2 <= micro_pc_1;
03428         micro_pc_3 <= micro_pc_2;
03429     end
03430     else if(branch_control == `BRANCH_procedure) begin
03431         if(branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_call_read && load_ea != 9'd0) begin
03432             micro_pc_1 <= perform_ea_read;
03433             micro_pc_2 <= micro_pc_0 + 9'd1;
03434             micro_pc_3 <= micro_pc_1;
03435         end
03436         else if(branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_call_read && load_ea == 9'd0) begin
03437             micro_pc_1 <= micro_pc_0 + 9'd1;
03438             micro_pc_2 <= micro_pc_1;
03439             micro_pc_3 <= micro_pc_2;
03440         end
03441         else if(branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_call_write && save_ea != 9'd0) begin
03442             micro_pc_1 <= save_ea;
03443             micro_pc_2 <= micro_pc_1;
03444             micro_pc_3 <= micro_pc_2;
03445         end
03446         else if((branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_call_load_ea && load_ea != 9'd0) ||
03447                 (branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_call_perform_ea_read) ||
03448                 (branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_call_perform_ea_write) ||
03449                 (branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_call_save_ea && save_ea != 9'd0) ||
03450                 (branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_call_trap) )
03451         begin
03452             micro_pc_1 <= micro_pc_0 + 9'd1;
03453             micro_pc_2 <= micro_pc_1;
03454             micro_pc_3 <= micro_pc_2;
03455         end
03456         else if(branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_return) begin
03457             micro_pc_1 <= micro_pc_2;
03458             micro_pc_2 <= micro_pc_3;
03459             micro_pc_3 <= 9'd0;
03460         end
03461         else if(branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_push_micropc) begin
03462             micro_pc_1 <= micro_pc_0;
03463             micro_pc_2 <= micro_pc_1;
03464             micro_pc_3 <= micro_pc_2;
03465         end
03466         else if(branch_offset == `PROCEDURE_pop_micropc) begin
03467             micro_pc_1 <= micro_pc_2;
03468             micro_pc_2 <= micro_pc_3;
03469             micro_pc_3 <= 9'd0;
03470         end
03471     end
03472 end
